message:
SYSTEM: SPARQL_Streams.pdf: Página 5
C-SPARQL Evaluation
Query Processing
Stored RDF processed by triple store
Steaming RDF processed by STREAM using CQL and 
mapping tuples to triples (Esper in fact, not STREAM/CQL)
Query Stack
Generate Operator Graph
Places window immediately above stream source
Adds operators: stream, window, aggregate, filter
Generate Denotational Graph
Distinguish static from streaming data
Optimise
Push σ/π down – not pushed all the way
D. F. Barbieri, D. Braga, S. Ceri, and M. Grossniklaus. An execution environment for C-
SPARQL queries. In EDBT2010, pp 441–452, Lausanne, Switzerland, March 2010.
speaker: SYSTEM
